snippet: Wall Street closed slightly higher on Friday after economic data did little to alter expectations the Federal Reserve may begin to scale back its stimulus measures next week.
abstract: Stocks rise broadly, giving Dow Jones industrial average its best week since January, 2013.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street closed slightly higher on Friday after economic data did little to alter expectations the Federal Reserve may begin to scale back its stimulus measures next week.

headline.main: Dow Closes Best Week Since January
headline.print_headline: Dow Closes Best Week Since January
